channel.title: Communications
channel.description: Get in touch with us here at the Reliquary directly or through electronic communication.
channel.dc:creator: cityreliquary@dhlabsnyc.com

item.title: CR Museum Telephone Hotline
item.description: Call us at 718.782.4842, that's 718-R-U-CIVIC for more information on the City Reliquary Museum & Civic Organization...

item.title: Sending Us A Package
item.description: Put a Stamp on It and Send it Along......

item.title: Joining Our Mailing List
item.description: Join our mailing list to receive updates concerning upcoming collections and other events....

item.title: Sending Us A Message
item.description: If would like to propose a Community Collections Project, or would simply like to submit a general request or comment please fill out the form below....

item.title: Message Received
item.description: Thank you for your input. We'll review your comments and get back to you as soon as possible....

item.title: Mailing List Success
item.description: Thanks for joining. Check your email address for confirmation....
